title: My father always wanted to be the corpse at every funeral, the bride at every wedding and the baby at every christening.
author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

title: Bride: A woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her.
author: Ambrose Bierce

title: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness, of hatred, of jealousy, and, most easily of all, the gate of fear.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

title: A man's got two shots for jewelry: a wedding ring and a watch. The watch is a lot easier to get on and off than a wedding ring.
author: John Mayer

title: Never get married in the morning - you never know who you might meet that night.
author: Paul Hornung

title: Getting married, for me, was the best thing I ever did. I was suddenly beset with an immense sense of release, that we have something more important than our separate selves, and that is the marriage. There's immense happiness that can come from working towards that.
author: Nick Cave

title: Weddings are important because they celebrate life and possibility.
author: Anne Hathaway

title: There's a big difference between falling in love with someone and falling in love with someone and getting married. Usually, after you get married, you fall in love with the person even more.
author: Dave Grohl

title: A bride at her second marriage does not wear a veil. She wants to see what she is getting.
author: Helen Rowland

title: I remember when I was in school, they would ask, 'What are you going to be when you grow up?' and then you'd have to draw a picture of it. I drew a picture of myself as a bride.
author: Gwen Stefani

title: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
author: Barbara De Angelis

title: My mother says I didn't open my eyes for eight days after I was born, but when I did, the first thing I saw was an engagement ring. I was hooked.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

title: One tradition I have with my friends is that when one of us gets married, we have a ton of fragrance oils and pretty bottles at the bachelorette party. Everyone puts a drop or two in a bottle for the bride and makes a wish, and the bride wears our creation on her wedding day.
author: Jennifer Aniston

title: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
author: Zig Ziglar

title: I'd imagine my wedding as a fairy tale... huge, beautiful and white.
author: Paris Hilton

title: I chose my wife, as she did her wedding gown, for qualities that would wear well.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

title: The chain of wedlock is so heavy that it takes two to carry it - and sometimes three.
author: Heraclitus

title: I'm one of those people who has always been a bridesmaid.
author: Piper Laurie

title: I sang a song at my sister's wedding. My mother forced me into that, too. But that one felt all right.
author: Adam Sandler

title: It's a funny thing that when a man hasn't anything on earth to worry about, he goes off and gets married.
author: Robert Frost

title: All weddings, except those with shotguns in evidence, are wonderful.
author: Liz Smith

title: Saw a wedding in the church. It was strange to see what delight we married people have to see these poor fools decoyed into our condition.
author: Samuel Pepys

title: Monica Seles: I'd hate to be next door to her on her wedding night.
author: Peter Ustinov

title: An invitation to a wedding invokes more trouble than a summons to a police court.
author: William Feather

title: I believe that anybody who gets married should go to a counselor for months before the wedding. I think that's going to save guys a lot of money and the ladies a lot of heartbreak.
author: James Brolin

title: That is ever the way. 'Tis all jealousy to the bride and good wishes to the corpse.
author: James M. Barrie

title: Our dog died from licking our wedding picture.
author: Phyllis Diller

title: I am about to be married, and am of course in all the misery of a man in pursuit of happiness.
author: Lord Byron

title: If it were not for the presents, an elopement would be preferable.
author: George Ade

title: Of course, I do have a slight advantage over the rest of you. It helps in a pinch to be able to remind your bride that you gave up a throne for her.
author: Edward VIII

title: I want the big drama. I always said I don't want a wedding I want a parade.
author: Star Jones

title: Music played at weddings always reminds me of the music played for soldiers before they go into battle.
author: Heinrich Heine

title: I have great hopes that we shall love each other all our lives as much as if we had never married at all.
author: Lord Byron

title: When the wedding march sounds the resolute approach, the clock no longer ticks, it tolls the hour. The figures in the aisle are no longer individuals, they symbolize the human race.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

title: The trouble with wedlock is that there's not enough wed and too much lock.
author: Christopher Morley

title: When I design a wedding dress with a bustle, it has to be one the bride can dance in. I love the idea that something is practical and still looks great.
author: Vera Wang

title: Personally, I'm an advocate for short engagements. Long sometimes means there is a reason for it. Two years engaged and no wedding... I'd be upset.
author: Emily Blunt

title: There's a higher form of happiness in commitment. I'm counting on it.
author: Claire Forlani

title: The Wedding March has a bit of a death march in it.
author: Brian May

title: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
author: Groucho Marx

title: A woman seldom asks advice before she has bought her wedding clothes.
author: Joseph Addison

title: No jealousy their dawn of love overcast, nor blasted were their wedded days with strife; each season looked delightful as it past, to the fond husband and the faithful wife.
author: James Beattie

title: For a girl, the wedding is when you're married. For a guy, it's when you get engaged. It takes a real aggressive human being to back out between the ring and the wedding.
author: Max Greenfield

title: You may invite the entire 35th Division to your wedding if you want to. I guess it's going to be yours as well as mine. We might as well have the church full while we are at it.
author: Bess Truman

title: Quarrels often arise in marriages when the bridal gifts are excessive.
author: Antisthenes

title: I don't ever really feel that wearing my wedding ring is what determines me being married or not.
author: Jessica Simpson

title: I really did put up all my wedding pictures on my website. And I swear to you, my wedding pictures got downloaded just as much as my bikini pictures.
author: Cindy Margolis

title: The Wedding March always reminds me of the music played when soldiers go into battle.
author: Heinrich Heine

title: A person's character is but half formed till after wedlock.
author: Charles Simmons

title: In the '50s, a lot of girls never saw beyond the wedding day.
author: Helen Reddy

title: I'm getting married because I'm in love with a girl and want to spend my life with her. You can't live your life doing what other people want you to or you'll be miserable. At some point you just have to be yourself.
author: Dan Marino

title: A gloomy guest fits not a wedding feast.
author: Friedrich Schiller

title: For me, life has either been a wake or a wedding.
author: Peter O'Toole

title: In Hollywood, brides keep the bouquets and throw away the groom.
author: Groucho Marx

title: I think a lot of people who feel as though they desperately want to be married oftentimes simply desperately want to have a wedding.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

title: Christmas carols always brought tears to my eyes. I also cry at weddings. I should have cried at a couple of my own.
author: Ethel Merman

title: The first thing I did when I sold my book was buy a new wedding ring for my wife and asked her to marry me all over again.
author: Nicholas Sparks

title: A wedding is such a girl thing.
author: Selma Blair

title: A young bride is like a plucked flower; but a guilty wife is like a flower that had been walked over.
author: Honore de Balzac

title: I see an insidious problem in the marketing of weddings as 'the happiest day of your life.' The pressure that is placed upon this event to be the alpha and omega of your entire existence makes it, I think, into a kind of nuptial New Year's Eve, and we all know how that usually turns out.
author: Jessi Klein

title: When he came back from downtown, he had forgotten to bring his license, his identification, the $2 for the wedding license. So we got married two days later.
author: Eydie Gorme

title: I don't know nothing about no marriages or nothing. I ain't even never been to a wedding.
author: Mike Epps

title: Falling in love was the easy part; planning a wedding - yikes!
author: Niecy Nash

title: I get very nervous when I have to take my wedding ring off.
author: Jerry O'Connell

title: I think a lot of people get so obsessed with the wedding and the expense of the wedding that they miss out on what the real purpose is. It's not about a production number, it's about a meaningful moment between two people that's witnessed by people that they actually really know and care about.
author: Jane Seymour

title: No wedding bells for me anymore. I've been happily married to my profession for years.
author: Shirley Bassey

title: People always complain, 'you never invited me to your wedding', but I prefer casual weddings.
author: Sinead O'Connor

title: O month when they who love must love and wed.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

title: The press is just not your friend when it comes to a marriage. That's why we didn't sell the pictures of our wedding, and we got offered millions of dollars for them, millions.
author: Katy Perry

title: It was only literally hours after the wedding when he felt he didn't have to keep up the facade.
author: Trisha Goddard

title: When I decided to get married at 40, I couldn't find a dress with the modernity or sophistication I wanted. That's when I saw the opportunity for a wedding gown business.
author: Vera Wang

title: I don't think it's possible to have a wedding without it being stressful!

title: I think that weddings have probably been crashed since the beginning of time. Cavemen crashed them. You go to meet girls. It makes sense.

title: Wedding: the point at which a man stops toasting a woman and begins roasting her.
author: Helen Rowland

title: Women who marry early are often overly enamored of the kind of man who looks great in wedding pictures and passes the maid of honor his telephone number.

title: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
author: Paul Sweeney

title: A wedding dress is both an intimate and personal for a woman - it must reflect the personality and style of the bride.
author: Carolina Herrera

title: In Italy, they say rain on your wedding day is symbolic of fresh beginnings, cleansing, a pure marriage, and also a wet knot that can't be untied.

title: Someday I'll get married, and on my wedding day they'll be saying, 'Okay, we have to ask about that infamous Oscar kiss.'

title: It happened in Miami, in Coral Gables, a great big ol' Cuban wedding. It was pretty intense.
author: Jon Secada

title: When I got married, the Sun ran the headline: 'Here comes the bride, all fat and wide.' Luckily, it was a few days after the wedding - but it was still hideous to read at a great romantic moment.
author: Jo Brand

author: Miles Teller

title: Whenever I get married, it will be a Bengali wedding. If I won't have a Bengali wedding, my mother won't come. She has warned me. So, I am going to have a Bengali wedding for sure.
author: Bipasha Basu

title: I had a huge Indian wedding, and I did it for my wife, and I did it for my white friends.
author: Hasan Minhaj

title: My brother liked sewing and sculpting and making things, and my sister sewed and painted and cooked and baked. She's a professional baker now and makes the most gorgeous sculpture-like cakes. She's the queen of wedding cakes in the Lake Tahoe area.
author: John Lasseter

title: A delicious smoothie is a really easy way of taking on lots of amazing skin boosting ingredients and was my first port of call every morning in the run-up to my wedding - I'll throw in frozen berries, banana, spinach, almond butter, almond milk, and oats for a quick breakfast quite often.
author: Ella Woodward

title: Fabrics such as raw silk, velvet, shimmer, satin and georgette work well for the wedding season.
author: Masaba Gupta

title: Jealousy, greed, fear. We're all full of these things. But also love and compassion. If you saw a drowning baby, it wouldn't matter if you were wearing a tuxedo on the way to your own wedding. You'd jump in to save him.
author: John McAfee

title: I have three older brothers, and we all have different combinations of parents. My father was the best man at my mom's first wedding! author: Inara George

title: I spent so many years in terror of 'making it legal' because the expression rang all too true - the wedding ritual struck me as nothing but a flowery front for the fulfilment of countless, tedious contracts and obligations.

title: I love pizza. I want to marry it, but it would just be to eat her family at the wedding.

title: There is such an emotional connection between the bride and her wedding dress, whereas in ready-to-wear you may just be focusing on color or prints for that particular season.
author: Jenny Packham

title: I sang 'All Of Me' at the wedding. I sang 'Stay With You' from my first album. And then Stevie Wonder came up and sang 'Ribbon In the Sky.' It was impromptu... It was cool... He's always been a friend and a mentor to me.
author: John Legend

author: Jessica Valenti

title: For years my wedding ring has done its job. It has led me not into temptation. It has reminded my husband numerous times at parties that it's time to go home. It has been a source of relief to a dinner companion. It has been a status symbol in the maternity ward.

title: The most dangerous food is wedding cake.
author: James Thurber

title: My attachment to my wedding ring is a powerful symbol of the infinite love that I have for my wife and children.
author: Gad Saad

title: It is my childhood dream to have a Christian-style wedding, just like the fairy tales.
author: Sushmita Sen

title: I think everyone dreams of that nice romantic wedding.
author: Lance Bass

title: It might be a selfish choice, but I find it quite difficult to design for individuals and prefer the distance of larger schemes. It's the same reason why, as a designer, I don't do wedding dresses.
author: John Rocha

title: There is no way in the world anyone else could do my wedding other than myself, along with whomever I select to do various things.
author: Aretha Franklin

title: Since the day Brahma created the world to this day, no one's ever been able to satisfy a wedding guest. They always find some opportunity or other to find fault and criticise. One who can't even afford a dry piece of bread at home becomes a lord at the wedding party.
author: Munshi Premchand

title: In New York, I have a photo of my parents on their wedding day in 1947. They're beaming at home plate in Houston's Buffalo Stadium. I love the photo because my dad is smiling. He didn't smile much in his later years.

title: I've been sober for two-and-a-half years, My children are happy. In August, my wife and I will celebrate our fifteenth wedding anniversary. My band is back together with a sold-out tour.
author: Trey Anastasio

title: I am the center of attention in my job every single day; the thought of a wedding to me is exhausting. Why would I put myself through that?
author: Lady Gaga

title: Part of me believes that Beyonce and Jay-Z were naive when they chose to celebrate their five-year wedding anniversary in Cuba. However, as the daughter of a former political prisoner in Cuba, I would argue that they should have known better than to travel to the island and support its repressive regime.
author: Mercedes Schlapp

title: My uncle was an Elvis impersonator - his name was Perry, and he went by 'Elvis Perry' - and my work as a wedding singer landed me a spot in his act.
author: Ryan Gosling

title: Now that I think about it, my 40th birthday was the most anxiety I've ever had, and my wedding was also the second time I've had that much anxiety. So I'm starting to realize that I can't be throwing these big bash parties because I need to own that I get anxiety with a lot of people diverting their attention to me.
author: Jeannie Mai

title: A tradition I remember from my childhood was that when there was a wedding in any one family, the entire village shared the responsibility and contributed. Regardless of the caste or community, the bride became the daughter of not just a single family but of the entire village.
author: Ram Nath Kovind

title: I'm a jewelry girl. I became with friends with designer Irene Neuwirth a few years ago. At that point, I just used to wear my wedding rings. Very low key. Now, if I could, I'd be draped from head to toe in her jewelry all the time. Everything she makes is beautiful.
author: Busy Philipps

title: The key to a happy marriage is myself being absent for long periods of time. My wife Leesa and I will celebrate our tenth wedding anniversary next year, but if my comedy gigs petered out and I was around the house more, we'd 100% be getting divorced.
author: Romesh Ranganathan

title: I moved to Los Angeles in January 2004 because a buddy of mine, who I met at a friend's wedding, said he could get me a room in his apartment for $500 a month. I took it thinking that it would probably only be about six months before I moved back to Chicago, but I fell in love with it.
author: Jake Johnson

title: My biggest blast-off hit was 'You Raise Me Up.' If you ever have a wedding or a funeral, it's a good pick.
author: Josh Groban

title: I couldn't tell you my wedding anniversary (although I seem to remember it was in June. Or maybe July. Definitely a month beginning with a 'J,' anyhow. But not January. Um. I think) and people I went to school with get extremely fed up with me when I bump into them in the street and have absolutely no recollection of their faces.
author: Claudia Winkleman

title: My mother and father had a terrible marriage. They celebrated their wedding anniversary one year with their friends. Why did they celebrate? Maybe because they had lasted so many years without killing each other.
author: Marina Abramovic

title: We all have special numbers in our lives, and 4 is that for me. It's the day I was born. My mother's birthday, and a lot of my friends' birthdays, are on the fourth; April 4 is my wedding date.
author: Beyonce Knowles

title: And we've got a toaster and everything. So there is no reason for the wedding.
author: Karl Pilkington

title: Sepia in particular tends to make everything look a bit romantic and almost sentimental, hence the fact that it remains such a popular choice for wedding photographs.
author: Martin Parr

title: Wedding is destiny, and hanging likewise.
author: John Heywood

title: I only did karaoke once in my life. It was with Courtney Love and it was a total disaster. She pulled me on stage in front of 500 people at a wedding. I'd never done karaoke before.
author: Jared Leto

title: There's been a lot of wedding songs and proposals. It's cool because when they play it at weddings so, it means a lot to them. That's a big deal. They're always going to remember 'Head Over Boots' as played at their wedding.
author: Jon Pardi

author: Deborah Raney

author: Brad Paisley

title: There's something about wedding dresses that turn you into Cinderella a little.
author: Jedediah Bila

title: When I was little, I watched a lot of Disney movies - so I always imagined a big fairytale wedding as a kid. But when marriage became real, I felt an intimate wedding with close family and friends would be better.
author: Hazel Keech

title: I tie my wedding ring around my neck with an old shoelace. It's to remind me of why I play cricket: for my family - my wife Ruth and my boys Sam and Luca.
author: Andrew Strauss

title: I was able to attend a doggie wedding where the bride wore a custom made gown of taffeta and satin - the quality of the dress was nicer than a lot of the human weddings I've been to.
author: Beth Ostrosky Stern

title: Everywhere I go, people ask me about Jennifer Aniston's wedding. Everywhere I go. I always say to her, I'm like, 'Being friends with you is a burden. You think it's hard to be friends with me?'
author: Chelsea Handler

title: So many little girls dream about their wedding day. But with actresses, sometimes it's the inverse, because we get to be the centre of attention, looked up and down, dressed up for premieres all the time. The pull isn't quite as great.
author: Natalie Dormer

title: When I had a job catering, I catered a wedding for the Smashing Pumpkins bassist in Indiana. And I served Billy Corgan shrimp off a tray.
author: Amy Poehler

title: In the Mexican culture, we never miss a baptism, a birthday, a baby shower, a wedding shower, a wedding. You must show up. Otherwise, you'll be in big trouble.
author: Eva Longoria

title: Personally, I would miss a wedding. I would miss childbirth. I would miss a bar mitzvah just to see me talk at all.
author: Maxwell Jacob Friedman

title: I don't really have a treasured possession, but I do love my family's proper old photo album. We all have hundreds of photos on our phones now, but you can't beat the old albums stuffed with black-and-white wedding photographs and 1970s Polaroids.
author: Nicola Walker

title: I ate no butcher's meat, lived chiefly on fruits, vegetables, and fish, and never drank a glass of spirits or wine until my wedding day. To this I attribute my continual good health, endurance, and an iron constitution.
author: John James Audubon

title: I use Pinterest for everything. Book collections, trips, hobbies. It's all there. I planned my wedding on it. When I had a kid, I planned all his stuff on it. So it was nice to discover that I wasn't the only one.
author: Ben Silbermann

title: A wedding is a funeral where you smell your own flowers.
author: Eddie Cantor

title: I use filming as an excuse to take classes. I got my certification in sailing for 'Wedding Crashers,' and now I can handle a 26-foot boat. I played a seamstress once, so I took sewing classes. I love dipping into these other lives.
author: Rachel McAdams

title: In marriage there are no manners to keep up, and beneath the wildest accusations no real criticism. Each is familiar with that ancient child in the other who may erupt again. We are not ridiculous to ourselves. We are ageless. That is the luxury of the wedding ring.
author: Enid Bagnold

title: Narciso Rodriguez was my first fashion big brother. He made my wedding dress, which was wonderful.
author: Claire Danes

title: Ariel may look a lot like Barbie, and her adventure may be limited to romance and over with the wedding bells, but unlike, say, Cinderella or Sleeping Beauty, she's active, brave and determined, the heroine of her own life. She even rescues the prince. And that makes her a rare fish, indeed, in the world of preschool culture.
author: Katha Pollitt

title: Jo Sykes made these incredible leather jackets: the leather was like butter. I had one, but I lost it at a wedding in Ibiza. It was so sad; I've not been able to replace.
author: Poppy Delevingne

title: I just wrapped this movie called 'The Wedding Crashers' which was a pretty big break for me.
author: Bradley Cooper

title: I've always dreamt about having kids more so than my wedding day. When it comes to colors, flowers, dresses... no idea. But if you ask me about kids; how many I want, names, genders? I'll have a full list for you!
author: Kaitlyn Bristowe

title: Prop 8 did something that no other state in the history of this country has done. It took away the rights of people that already were legally affirmed. Imagine someone putting something on the ballot saying your wedding, your marriage is no longer valid.
author: Gavin Newsom

title: My favorite time to dance is at, like, wedding receptions, when it's all ages and everyone seems to be having fun.
author: Neil Patrick Harris

title: As a pastor, you get invited into the most poignant moments of people's lives. Whether it's a wedding or a funeral or a hospital visit, you get invited into the center of the event, whether or not you know the people.
author: Rob Bell

title: The wedding ring on my left hand was bought by my grandfather, Samuel Miliband, in Brussels in 1920. I never knew him, as he died when I was one. But his ring was kept by my aunt until it was placed on my finger by my wife Louise 32 years later.
author: David Miliband

title: In my head, at least, the business of spinning stories has no closing time. Twists in my characters' lives, glimpses of their secrets, obstacles to their dreams... all arrive unbidden when I'm getting cash at the ATM, walking my son to camp, singing a hymn at a wedding.
author: Julia Glass

title: On the night of the winter solstice, when the dead get their annual reprieve, they go up to the 24-hour donut shop and wedding chapel to get hitched. Marriage is a good and proper pursuit for dead people. For a while, it relieves the dark, shuddering loneliness of the afterlife.
author: Rachel Swirsky

title: My friends asked me to be a reverend at their wedding in France a few years ago. I went on the Internet, and within 15 seconds, I was printing out a certificate which allowed me to officiate at their wedding.
author: Lucy Punch

title: When I celebrated my bar mitzvah, there was no cake. Today, there is no such thing as a bar mitzvah in the United States without a special cake. It can be even more complicated and expensive than a wedding cake, because bar-mitzvah cakes are often based on a particular theme.
author: Ron Ben-Israel

title: There are so many moving parts to a wedding, and I, it turns out, am a bit of a perfectionist.
author: Jeremiah Brent

title: Imagine owning a one million pound coin. Where would you put it? The pressure. I never even take my wedding rings off after the time I lost one for days, only to find it in a random trouser pocket.
author: Konnie Huq

title: I wanna stay an eternal girlfriend. I want to have my boyfriend's children, but I don't think we need a piece of paper to regulate the game, and we don't have to go through the whole stress of a wedding and suffering to throw a good party.
author: Shakira

title: On my wedding day, I gifted my wife a platinum ring.
author: Vijender Singh

title: I learned hard lessons in life; I had to because I had so much happen: My mother died my sophomore year in high school. The next year, same day, my brother dropped dead. Two years after that, I got married because my girlfriend got pregnant. The year after my wedding, my father - who I had only recently met - died.
author: Bernie Mac

title: Wedding fever is one of the scariest diseases I have ever seen.
author: Jessica Valenti

title: I've been in a couple of weddings where the coolest people that were the most day before so mellow and then the day of the wedding freaking out.
author: Matthew McConaughey

title: The prenup needs to be drawn up months before the wedding, not days - it's not something you slap together and sign in the car on the way to the ceremony. A shotgun prenup might not hold up in court.
author: Suze Orman

title: I met Forest Whitaker on 'Our Family Wedding' and we struck up a real bond and friendship.
author: Rick Famuyiwa

title: I mean, I do wear a wedding ring and take it off when I shoot.
author: Henry Ian Cusick

title: Each youth betrays considerable anxiety about the wedding night ahead.
author: Gore Vidal

title: She tells enough white lies to ice a wedding cake.
author: Margot Asquith

title: I moved to the city in August of 1980, and someone I thought was a friend had an apartment in this wedding cake of a building, so I slept on her couch for a few days.
author: Holly Hunter

title: I've always worn my wedding band when I'm working out. A few years ago I realized how dangerous wearing a metal band could be and switched to silicone.
author: Rich Froning Jr.

title: On the publicity tour of 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding,' I was asked over and over again, if, as the writer, I felt it was a fair depiction of real life to have someone of my er, below average looks, hook up with hottie John Corbett.
author: Nia Vardalos

title: Hats are the epitome of Englishness, and a royal wedding is the penultimate moment for a hat designer. I'm Irish, but I am a royalist and I believe in fantasy.
author: Philip Treacy

title: I was a wedding singer as a teenager.
author: John Legend

title: If you write a song, and you go into a restaurant, and there's a guy with a piano singing and he's playing piano, singing your song, or you hear it at a wedding or at an airport... it's fun!
author: Jesse Harris

title: The process of making a wedding cake is complex on its own, from designing, mis-en-place, baking, frosting, structuring, decorating, to delivering.
author: Ron Ben-Israel

title: From the beginning, I knew I wanted a beach wedding so I'm thankful looking back that this is how everything turned out.
author: Maria Taylor

title: The first thing I ever saw Bradley Cooper in was 'Wedding Crashers.'
author: Ed Weeks

title: My mom used to make my costumes when I was little; she sews a lot. One year, I was a bride and I had a big wedding dress and a bouquet. Another year I was a medieval princess with a long teal dress and a veil. It was a little extravagant, but it was cute!
author: Sasha Pieterse

title: I'm the person who will go to a wedding and switch the place cards around because I don't want to sit next to someone I don't know, because I'm so bad at chatting to strangers.
author: Sharon Horgan

title: A wedding, people decide to get married, it comes out of such love for one another and then women can turn into these other people. They're planning something that's the biggest event they'll ever plan in their lives and it turns them into this other person, so it's not totally the guy's fault that he's feeling disconnected from this person.
author: Alison Brie

title: People ask if my parents are hippies, but they're actually very conservative. A girl called Rebel sang at their wedding, and that's where my name came from.
author: Rebel Wilson

title: I can wear a sexy dress to any red carpet event. My wedding is my chance to go all the way and wear a princess silhouette.
author: Roselyn Sanchez

title: Valentino made my day suit for the wedding of Paloma Picasso in Paris.
author: Andre Leon Talley

title: It's always great to have things from France at a wedding. It's symbolic of style, of culture, of taste.
author: Andre Leon Talley

title: I haven't made many wedding dresses. It's a dress very, very important for the girl; it's important to know the person, I believe, but at the same time it should be a shock to the person - the person should be shocked to be suddenly revealed. That's the work of a designer sometimes, to propose an ID of look.
author: Olivier Theyskens

title: I wish I could wear 10 dresses to my wedding. It's so sad that you put it in storage and then never see it again. I am going to sleep in mine after I wear it.
author: Eva Longoria

title: It was never important for a wedding to be about anything other than me and my partner. A big celebration was never my cup of tea.
author: Mandy Moore

title: If you had asked me when I was 28 and in my wedding dress if I ever thought I would end up in my forties flipping my husband the bird over potato chips, I'd say you were crazy.
author: Jenna McCarthy

title: Our whole wedding cost 180 bucks. Afterward, we re-heated lasagna for everyone and set off fireworks.
author: Larry the Cable Guy

title: I do not have a bride gene. I haven't been planning a wedding since I was 3. I never put a sheet on my head and pretended that it was a veil.
author: Niecy Nash

title: When I got married in 1991, I had never been to a wedding, so I didn't know that my wedding was tacky. I didn't know that I was getting married in a quinceanera dress, because there was nobody there to cry over me and tell me I look like a fool.
author: Niecy Nash

title: I don't want to be Carrie Bradshaw. I don't want the wedding to be bigger than Big. I'm just grateful to know that the first time I fell in love wasn't the last time.
author: Niecy Nash

title: The most terrifying thing in the world was having to give a speech at my girlfriend's wedding. I was physically shaking and sweating the entire time.
author: Lindy Booth

title: I've worn a dress at my wedding. I've worn 6-inch Louboutins. I've got no fear and no shame.
author: A. J. McLean

title: As a child, as a cinemagoer, I think there is nothing better than being in a cinema or watching a film. I think it's just a while magical... it almost feels like you're at a big party in India, where you're singing, you're dancing, you're laughing, you're crying, you feel like you're at a wedding because our films invariably cover all emotions.
author: Karan Johar

title: Come on, planning a wedding, let's be honest, it's not fun. It's not fun being in a wedding.
author: Wendi McLendon-Covey

title: I'm not really that girl who dreams about her wedding day.
author: Taylor Swift

title: My problem with the wedding industry started when I studied in college and liked to have the television on in the background, and 'A Wedding Story' on TLC always came on, and I'd get irritated that the story of two people making a lifelong commitment to each other could be encapsulated in a half-hour show about the party they throw.
author: Jessica Valenti

title: One of the great things about being a writer/journalist is that my boss loves me to go out and do features on being someone else. I did a feature on Kate Middleton, where I went to an incredible fancy state home in the countryside, put on a wedding dress and posed for engagement pictures with a fake Prince William.
author: Caitlin Moran

title: I just wasn't one of those girls who dreamt of her wedding day and the birth of her first child.
author: Sarah Jessica Parker

title: I love 3-D. I have been a big fan of 3-D for a long, long time. I took my 1988 wedding pictures in 3-D!
author: John Lasseter

title: I love dress shopping, and I love talking about the wedding food. That's what makes me happy.
author: Chrissy Teigen

title: You can easily take photographs at a wedding - no one would question it. But funerals are different.
author: Martin Parr

title: Granddad offered me one hundred dollars if I would cut my mop of curly hair into a neat military style. Just before the wedding, I got a light trim. It wasn't enough for Granddad, and he didn't pay.
author: David Eisenhower

title: Seriously I suspected I was a good actor, though I didn't know it during 'Monsoon Wedding.' Now I realize the more I learn, the less I know about acting... and life.
author: Randeep Hooda

title: I think the biggest thing that I have to do is to remind people that poetry is there for us to turn to not only to remind us that we're not alone - for example, if we are grieving the loss of someone - but also to help us celebrate our joys. That's why so many people I know who've gotten married will have a poem read at the wedding.
author: Natasha Trethewey

title: It's not that I think weddings - or marriages - are letdowns. It's just that I want to see my wedding as one awesome achievement on a continuum of achievements, all of which were, in their way, just as beautiful and profound for having led me to the current one.
author: Jessi Klein

title: Do I believe in coupling? Do I believe in commitment? Do I believe in co-parenting, raising children together, having a family, and growing old with someone? I absolutely believe in all of those things. I just don't believe that you need to be married to do that. I love going to weddings, though. I do love a good wedding.
author: Laura Wasser

title: My wedding won't be a hush-hush affair. When I get married, everyone will get to know about it... there'll be nothing speculative about my wedding.
author: Bipasha Basu

title: I want to be a simple bride when I get married. I want a beach wedding where I am running around on the sand in a white dress.
author: Sonakshi Sinha

title: Even if you believe a creator god invented the laws of physics, would you so insult him as to suggest that he might capriciously and arbitrarily violate them in order to walk on water, or turn water into wine as a cheap party trick at a wedding?
author: Richard Dawkins

title: Recently, I was preparing to sing Springsteen's 'If I Should Fall Behind' for a wedding and was unable to get through it without tears. My wife handed me 'Love You Forever.' I read it. I cried. But that cry somehow cured me of crying while singing the song. Go figure.
author: Clyde Edgerton

title: My sister really drooled a lot when she was younger. For her wedding, I was going to get her one of those lace drool cups that go around the ears.
author: Cheri Oteri

title: I'm used to being in front of camera and knowing what to think. But if you're asking me to be me, I get very self-conscious. My job isn't to be me. Being an actor, people think you can do a eulogy at a funeral, a speech at a wedding. I find all that very nerve-racking.
author: Eddie Marsan

title: Even if it's your wedding, if you're a guy, it's boring.
author: Blake Shelton

title: The best thing I ever bought is a vintage Oscar de la Renta short gingham dress that I wore to my rehearsal dinner the night before my wedding.
author: Kelly Wearstler

title: I love rings, but I can't wear them. I mean, look at my knuckles. My fingers and joints are so swollen from years of playing. That means no wedding band, either. Luckily, I have a very understanding wife.
author: Justin Tuck

title: What an electric thrill it sends up and down the spine, how it sets the heart racing: A Royal Romance! A Royal Wedding! The pomp and the pageantry!
author: Hamish Bowles

title: I love Spanish cities, particularly Barcelona, Madrid and Palma, which has the most amazing cathedral that I once went to for a wedding.
author: Louise Nurding

title: Growing up, I was never the kind of girl to dream about wedding dresses and pretty houses.
author: Louise Nurding

title: An embellished top with slim pants is great, even for a wedding.
author: Brad Goreski

title: I love dress shopping, and I love talking about the wedding food. That's what makes me happy. If you tell me to do a guest list, I cry. I hate it.
author: Chrissy Teigen

title: I would like to sing for the Pope. And the Queen, and at Simon Cowell's wedding.
author: Jackie Evancho

title: I tried writing this book about a singer in a wedding band, but realized I only wanted to write the book so I could have an excuse to sing with a wedding band as research. That's not a good enough reason to write a book.
author: Megan McCafferty

title: At my wedding, I was dancing so furiously that I fell hard on my kneecaps. The next morning, my knees were so swollen that I had to get a wheelchair at the airport to go on my honeymoon.
author: Casey Wilson

title: I am happy. I have a wonderful marriage. I was in a not-great second marriage for 20 years, then I fell in love with Steve, my first husband, again, and we remarried. I wore the dress from our first wedding in 1982 - it was tight, but I could get into it.
author: Marie Osmond

title: I worked a lot with Nick Knight and John Galliano when John was at Dior. He also made my wedding dress. He'll always hold a special place; I have most of my memorable, iconic moments in fashion with him.
author: Liberty Ross

title: One of the most common reasons people renovate their homes is a change in their lifestyle - an upcoming wedding, a new baby, or grown children moving away.
author: Candice Olson

title: I have a memory of my mother kneeling in front of a cabinet in our home, tenderly cradling her wedding china. We never used the plates; she died in her 40s without ever letting herself enjoy these gorgeous pieces. I told myself that I would use my precious items.
author: Roma Downey

title: I really was about to pass out during my entire wedding. I just didn't know if I could marry anybody.
author: Patricia Richardson

title: My husband and I click wedding rings sometimes and say, 'By the power of the Castle of Greyskull!'
author: Tamora Pierce

title: Me and the Dap-Kings, the whole band is playing a wedding band in 'The Wolf of Wall Street.'
author: Sharon Jones

title: I had a Hebraic wedding in New York, so I'm definitely Jewish.
author: Amar'e Stoudemire

title: Your wedding is your red carpet moment, and while brides definitely can take some chances with style, you don't want to look like a fad.
author: Reem Acra

title: I think my first experience of art, or the joy in making art, was playing the horn at some high-school dance or bar mitzvah or wedding, looking at a roomful of people moving their bodies around in time to what I was doing. There was a piano player, a bass player, a drummer, and my breath making the melody.
author: Robert Pinsky

title: I'm still waiting for someone to call me to cater their wedding. But that's gonna cost you. If you want my cousin Jerez to play the sax, that's going to cost you a little more. The sky's the limit after that.
author: Coolio

title: I'd want it to be really special to both of us, but I'm a huge fan of 'At Last' as a wedding song. But what's also really cool is songs that no one else would have at their wedding, like an obscure Radiohead song.
author: Mary Lambert

title: I get offered: 'Here's a girl who's mad at another girl for having a wedding on the same day.' That'll be a big hit, but I don't want to do that.
author: Amy Heckerling

title: I grew up in a very small town, but it happened to be in western Massachusetts, where there were a lot of gay people. I remember my aunt going to a gay wedding when I was 11, and I thought it was the coolest thing.
author: Elizabeth Banks

title: If I do find myself walking up the aisle and dancing at my own wedding reception, I want the first dance to be both spontaneous and dramatic.
author: Anton du Beke

title: I try to study the background of the country I am in and what were my hits there, so I can at least give them some of what they want. It's like a wedding - give them something old, something new, something borrowed and definitely something blue!
author: Betty Wright

title: I just went to a wedding of a friend of mine who happens to be gay. Because somebody doesn't think the way I do, doesn't mean that I can't care about them or can't love them.
author: John Kasich

title: In 1966, I bought my parents a carriage clock for their silver wedding anniversary. It was last wound 30 years later, in December 1996, the month my father died.
author: Clive Sinclair

title: The Hiltons know how to put on a good wedding, that's all I can say.
author: Conrad Sewell

title: Sometimes, my books start with a scene I see in my mind, such as a woman in a wedding dress running away from her wedding like in 'Embers of Love.' Sometimes, a book can start with a character.
author: Tracie Peterson

title: Hierarchical formulations died because their wedding cake levels posited a multiply fractured cosmos that does not match the Space Age revelation of a unified universe in which the earth is clearly in, rather than separated from, the heavens. Hierarchical representations do not reflect what either the world or we are like.
author: Eugene Kennedy

title: A walk through the storage facility of the community museum where I worked might easily have convinced you that people in the past wore only wedding dresses, carried silver candlesticks, and played with porcelain dolls.
author: Susanna Kearsley

title: People didn't just wear wedding dresses in the past. They also wore plain cotton shifts beneath them. As pretty as the dresses might be, and as lovely as they might look on display, if a museum doesn't hang the shifts beside them or acknowledge that the shifts existed, that exhibit's incomplete.
author: Susanna Kearsley

title: My sister, singer Jessie Ware, and I are always exchanging music. We brainstormed her wedding playlist for months.
author: Hannah Ware

title: I myself was a wedding photographer when I was, like, 16.
author: Kacy Hill

title: Wedding rings need to be sparkly to remind us not to have sex with other people.
author: Andrea Savage

title: What the bride should do is call guests who have young children and say: 'I'd love to have the kids at the wedding, but we won't have room. Would you get a baby sitter, and when we get back from our honeymoon, we'll have you guys over?'
author: Letitia Baldrige

title: You can have a wedding at Fenway Park.
author: Mike Barnicle

title: I had all kinds of fantasies, like a lot of girls, but did I actually go through the motions of planning a wedding and buying bridal magazines and imagining things and setting up who would play what role? No. Because as I grew up, I started to believe that I would be one of those gals that never got married.
author: Sara Ramirez

title: Growing up, I had one very specific idea of what a wedding should be, and that was the wedding of Fraeulein Maria and Captain von Trapp in 'The Sound of Music.'
author: Ellie Kemper

title: It took two months from the day my fiance proposed to my first Google search for 'wedding planning: how?' Now, let me interrupt myself here and share how much I hate using the word 'fiance.' It's so fancy, and it's hard not to sound like a jerk saying it. Which is why I will be using my own word for fiance: gloob.
author: Ellie Kemper

title: I am fully anticipating that something - perhaps many things - will not go according to plan on our actual wedding day. If some of the flowers are wilted, or there aren't enough vegetarian meals, or the priest calls me the wrong name, I will embrace these errors.
author: Ellie Kemper

title: I met Kanye. I'm starstruck, man, but I stayed away from that guy. I didn't want him to go on a rant, go off on me. He did it at his wedding.
author: Jay Pharoah

title: I've already been married six times in my career as an actress - twice as Becky - so I think a wedding of my own might feel too much like work!
author: Katherine Kelly

title: I love going to other people's weddings, but I have never desired a big white wedding for myself, and it has never been put on me as a pressure, an expectation.
author: Katherine Kelly

title: The pilot is the wedding, and the series is the relationship.
author: Thomas Gibson

title: I admire Eudora Welty. 'Delta Wedding' is a book I've given as a present to numerous women. Eudora Welty rocks. She writes such jewel-like, fine, refined short stories.
author: Nell Zink

title: Ever since I was a little girl, I wanted Valentino to design my wedding dress. Valentino is the definition of timeless elegance. I don't think there's another couture house like it.
author: Nicky Hilton

title: I saw a photo of a Christian Lacroix couture dress when I was in my teens and decided right then that that's how I wanted to look on my wedding day. In my mind, that's what angels looked like.
author: Margherita Missoni

title: I loved everything about my wedding look, but, in retrospect, I would have changed the position of where we attached the veil on my head. Make sure you test a few different placements and styles before the big day to make a clear vision and plan with your hairstylist.
author: Margherita Missoni

title: I don't talk about my personal life in the press; that's how I kept my wedding a secret.
author: Kerry Washington

title: I was never the girl who tore pictures out of wedding magazines.
author: Camila Alves

title: We served Twinkies and Sno Balls at our wedding. We put them on silver trays so they looked elegant - but they were the real deal!
author: Dylan Lauren

title: Whenever I went to a wedding or a party, girls kept complaining about their shoes. I love to dance, and I wanted them to have shoes they could keep on all night.
author: Edgardo Osorio

title: Not everyone can be successful selling fashion at $25,000 for a wedding outfit. Certain designers are able to do that. And there is only a certain amount of consumers who can do that. The real opportunity is in that $25 garment.
author: Imran Amed

title: Sure, men like a challenge - but so do women. And nobody likes to be challenged all the time. I know plenty of long-standing happy couples who slept together right away, spent hours yakking on the phone, split checks down the middle, and lived together for years before the wedding.
author: Katha Pollitt

title: If you're engaged more than a year, there's something up. There's lot of debate as to whether one should or shouldn't get married, but when you get engaged, it's a promise to get married, and if you don't just do it within a year, one of the parties is using the excuse of, like, 'I can't find the right venue' to put off the wedding.
author: Nicholas Stoller

title: Fantasies can be great, but we shouldn't make the wedding a fantasy, because the wedding is the gateway to married life. It shouldn't be a moment of illusion; it should be a moment of preparation.
author: Alain de Botton

title: I did calligraphy for the invitations for, like, Robin Thicke and Paula Patton's wedding.
author: Meghan Markle

title: I'm really close to my family, and I really want one of my own. But the wedding, it's not necessary for me.
author: Julia Restoin Roitfeld

title: After 'Muriel's Wedding,' I first went to America, and I was sent all these scripts about fat girls overcoming hurdles. Something in me knew not to go down that road, even if it was a good script.
author: Toni Collette

title: The white hot publicity that came from 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding' was appreciated but not sought, so I was happy to walk away from it and then write.
author: Nia Vardalos

title: I was in a fertility situation publicly, so I disappeared. I was very satisfied just being to able to creatively express myself with writing. The white hot publicity that came from 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding' was appreciated but not sought, so I was happy to walk away from it and then write.
author: Nia Vardalos

title: All my tattoos except my first were not planned. I would just go into the shop late at night with friends and ask for something on the spot. My first is my parents' wedding date. I thought it would soften the blow of getting a tattoo.
author: Hailey Baldwin

title: It was about 2012, 2013. I started from zero. Small fashion shows, small photoshoots. I've seen a lot. I've seen a lot of things up close. I married my sister off; I gave jahez for her wedding. I tried to keep relations going with my family. I bought a house for them in Multan. My parents are settled in Multan; my house is there.
author: Qandeel Baloch

title: It is sweet that people want to know everything about my wedding, but they should also respect my privacy.
author: Divyanka Tripathi

title: I am a celebrity, but I don't want people standing outside my wedding venue.
author: Divyanka Tripathi

title: Every wedding is slightly different from the other. But you always get to meet the funny uncle and the weirdo relatives, and there's always someone trying to beat you up for not playing enough Beatles songs or something.
author: Jens Lekman

title: I still love touring rock clubs around the world, and that's something that's really a part of me. I love making albums, and I'm a wedding singer on the side; that's my parallel career. So I love all those aspects of making music.
author: Jens Lekman

title: There was a thing on Facebook that said, 'Describe George Clooney's wedding in three words,' and my answer was, 'Not invited again.'
author: Michael O'Keefe

title: I didn't go abroad until quite late. A friend drove us to Amalfi, Italy, for his sister's wedding when I was a teenager. It was exciting driving through Europe.
author: David Harewood

title: I loved 'Monsoon Wedding' and 'Lunchbox' because they had 'real' stories. I wish there are more films made like them.
author: Garth Davis

title: I think the only consistent thing is that I like projects that explore different social themes. 'Our Family Wedding' is a comedy, but it deals with two different cultures coming together. It's also about people letting go.
author: Forest Whitaker

title: I don't understand why you have to wear a wedding ring to warn people off. You should be able to be faithful to that person without anything on your body to show that you are with someone.
author: Sam Smith

title: My wedding was a very private affair for close family and friends, so I had decided to hold a reception in my native town.
author: Mohit Chauhan

title: A wedding, a great wedding, is just a blast. A celebration of romance and community and love... What is unfun about that? Nothing.
author: Ariel Levy

title: I don't really have many regrets. I did miss a lot of the events in the days leading up to my sister's wedding because I was at a U17 camp. There were moments like that growing up when I felt like I focused too much on soccer. But that's probably the reason I am where I am today.
author: Alex Morgan

title: I never wanted a big wedding. I never wanted to wear a white dress or throw a bouquet.
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

title: The vibe of my wedding is kind of going to be ethereal. Simple and modern, in a way, but with a lot of greenery. So, eucalyptus, olive branches, moss, and candles - it's going to be very... I want it to feel very comfortable, but obviously sleek.
author: Sasha Pieterse

title: Neil Gaiman is a star. He constructs stories like some demented cook might make a wedding cake, building layer upon layer, including all kinds of sweet and sour in the mix.
author: Clive Barker

title: Onassis told me. He begged me to come to the wedding.
author: Lee Radziwill

title: I wasn't always overweight. I was a skinny little punk of a kid with severe asthma. When I got married at the age of 22, I wore a cut-down size eight wedding gown.
author: Mary Kay Andrews

title: There's no scenario in which I wouldn't want my entire family at a wedding.
author: Jordan Rodgers

title: My father and mother were not that compatible. I don't think they had a good wedding night, and I was the product of that. We weren't close.
author: Harry Dean Stanton

title: The most important item on my desk is a picture of my husband and three kids making kooky faces at my niece's wedding. We all look silly and happy.
author: Shira Goodman

title: You can give poor people this royal wedding to watch and make them feel good about themselves, or you can give them something useful like, I don't know... a toaster.
author: Bo Burnham

title: I think when wedding dresses are talked about, every woman has a different set of factors in her mind of what it could be because they've been thinking about it possibly for such a long time.
author: Giles Deacon

title: I don't want to write poems about the royal wedding. I would have to be moved by the event.
author: Derek Walcott

title: You can't make a rule about it. The minute you make a rule, it's like putting your wedding pictures in 'In Style' magazine - you're divorced.
author: Frances McDormand

title: I can't tell you how lucky I feel. I've gotten to work Peter Facinelli 'American Odyssey,' and I got to do 'My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2' - which really gave me such a tremendous amount of pride and patriotism, and it was very close to my heart. I've really had such great support, so many great teachers, and so many wonderful people surrounding me.
author: Elena Kampouris

title: Neither my fiance nor I take ourselves too seriously, and we want our wedding to reflect our lightheartedness.
author: Leah Pipes

title: I wore one of my own designs on my wedding day.
author: Emilia Wickstead

title: The first wedding dress I ever made was for myself. It was at a time when I had my business up and running, but it was still very early days, and I thought, 'This is my moment to do whatever I like.'
author: Emilia Wickstead

title: My wedding dress was featured by 'Vogue' and 'American Town and Country,' and from there, people started to come to us because they had seen that dress.
author: Emilia Wickstead

title: For most couples, the first event they plan together is their wedding.
author: Lenny Platt

title: I'm definitely willing to film it for sure. I feel like I've taken people on this incredible journey on 'Total Divas' and 'Total Bellas.' They have seen me cry, get angry, and be so many different ways about marriage. I feel like for my fan base, my Bella Army, I should let them tune in to my wedding.
author: Nikki Bella

title: I do not want my man to be exhausted for our wedding day, especially our wedding night.
author: Nikki Bella

title: When I saw Kate Moss's champagne tower from her wedding, I was like, 'Okay, check - I want that. I want fireworks.'
author: Nikki Bella

title: About my love life, I would like to say I am single till I have a ring on the right finger and a wedding date.
author: Krystle D'Souza

title: I love going to weddings. I love movie scenes of weddings. Even, like, TV-show weddings - I cry at every wedding.
author: Frankie Cosmos

title: So many of our businesses rely on green card holders - how are we supposed to attract these people if they think they'll be detained at the airport if they go abroad for a wedding or just to show their baby to relatives?
author: Raja Krishnamoorthi

title: It's mutual respect and love that are important, not a wedding.
author: Christie Hefner

title: I once accidentally 'replied all' and sent an email complaining about my then-boyfriend to a bunch of strangers. It was meant for my friend who was a bride, but I ended up addressing her entire wedding party. Her marriage lasted; my relationship didn't.
author: Faith Salie

title: Your wedding day is supposed to be your big day, and yet a lot of engaged couples find that instead of creating an event that will be important to them, they're dodging through a minefield of modern etiquette traps.
author: Emily V. Gordon

title: Dealing with wedding stuff is a bit of a double-edged sword - it seems that divorcees are expected to either burn it all on the front lawn, tears silently coursing down their faces, or keep the stuff, shrine-like, concealed somewhere in their homes.
author: Emily V. Gordon

title: I haven't worn make-up since my wedding, and my husband loves me a lot.
author: Leandra Medine

title: Having made all the decisions, I think a wedding day is a day when you want to forget what you are wearing and be in the moment.
author: Jenny Packham

title: We've been seeing a lot of brides buying two dresses for their wedding, especially in America, and a lot of brides are talking about changing shoes halfway through. It is a very long day to be wearing one pair of shoes, however comfortable they are. It is about marrying that combination of style and comfort together.
author: Jenny Packham

title: With a wedding gown, I have to make sure that people fall in love with it and that the details are very specific and special. There has to be a big story behind it and a great deal of integrity when it comes to the design.
author: Jenny Packham

title: Research the venue and location before outfit shopping, as it helps set the mood and style focus: a traditional wedding in the countryside offers a different set of sartorial rules to a tropical, beach vibe, for instance.
author: Jenny Packham

title: There's nothing standard about a wedding dress or shoes anymore.
author: Jenny Packham

title: We are all trained by Disney to believe that the wedding is the finish line, but the wedding is just another starting line. In light of this fact, we should quit the huge, fancy, debt-inducing weddings.
author: Glennon Doyle Melton

title: Even under the best circumstances, speaking at your own wedding ceremony is a high pressure endeavor. What even constitutes a vow? I always picture them as exclamations you bellow at the sky.
author: Josh Gondelman

title: I got 'Scandal,' and that was, far and away, the biggest deal that had happened in my career. Simultaneously, the stress from planning my wedding and being in the public eye for the first time, combined with genetics - I got the diagnosis that I had psoriasis, and I was completely embarrassed and ashamed. I felt like a lesser person.
author: Katie Lowes

title: I've had the kind of complex life I write about. I was a single mother for 12 years. I'd been engaged. The wedding fell through. I then discovered I was pregnant and opted to have the child on my own. I was a professor. I was in my mid-30s. I could manage it financially.
author: Stephanie Coontz
